content: how in this video to end of row jsl1 hang removable marker on working yarn slip 1 ws p106 120 133 146 159 173 sts turn work jsl1 purlwise with yarn in front knit/purl next stitch with k41 47 53 57 63 69 sts turn work marker hanging on ws between this stitch and the slipped stitch work the following at each side 7 times on ws jsl1 jp1 p8 9 10 11 12 13 sts turn work jk1 knit to gap pull on marker to place loop untwisted on rs jsl1 jk1 k8 9 10 11 12 13 sts turn work onto left needle k2tog next st and loop remove marker work the following at each side once jp1 purl to gap pull on marker to place loop untwisted on ws jsl1 jp1 p to end turn work onto left needle p2tog tbl next st and loop remove on rs jsl1 jk1 k to end turn work marker bobble 5 sts at beginning of next two row jw1 work in pattern to gap pull on marker to place loop untwisted onto left needle k2tog or p2tog tbl remove decrease 1 st each side every row 13 times as follows marker on ws p2tog p to last 2 sts p2tog on rs ssk k to last 2 sts k2tog scallops pattern row 1 ws knit 134 156 176 198 218 240 sts on needle row 2 purl row 3 knit divide for fronts and back row 4 k1 *yo k21 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 rs k23 27 31 36 40 44 sts bobble 4 6 8 10 12 14 sts row 5 p2 * p1 k3 5 times p2 repeat from * to last k80 90 98 106 114 124 sts bobble 4 6 8 10 12 14 sts k to st p1 end transfer back sts and right front sts to holder row 6 k1 *k1 yo k1 p3 k1 5 times yo repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 left front row 7 p2 *p2 k3 p1 5 times p2 repeat from * to purl 1 ws row last st p1 bobble 2 3 4 5 6 7 sts at beginning of next rs row then row 8 k1 * k1 yo twice ssk p2 5 times k1 yo decrease 1 st at armhole edge every rs row 3 4 5 7 8 9 twice repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 times as follows ssk k to end 18 20 22 24 26 28 sts on row 9 p2 *p4 k2 p1 5 times p4 repeat from * to needle last st p1 continue stockinette st even for 47 47 45 45 47 47 row row 10 k1 * k1 yo 4 times ssk p1 5 times k1 yo or until armhole measures approx 8 5 9 9 9 5 10 10 5 4 times repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 from bobble row row 11 p2 *p8 k1
